00085 bool RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuTest::
00086 onNetworkGameClicked(const CEGUI::EventArgs& evt){
00087   LOGI("NetworkGame button clicked");
00088 
00089   GuiManager::getSingleton().beginGuiFadeOut();
00090 
00091   // We must wait for the CEGUI fade end to prevent
00092   // SEGFAULT in access to CEGUI windows (getAlpha())
00093   while (GuiManager::getSingleton().isInGuiFadeOut()){
00094     Ogre::Root::getSingleton().renderOneFrame();
00095   }
00096 
00097   GuiManager::getSingleton().removeCurrentCEGUILayout();
00098   GuiManager::getSingleton().loadCEGUILayout("connection.layout");
00099 
00100   GuiManager::getSingleton().beginGuiFadeIn();
00101 
00102   // Subscribe event
00103   CEGUI::Window* root=CEGUI::System::getSingleton().getGUISheet();
00104 
00105   // Back button
00106   CEGUI::Window* btnBack=root->getChild("Back");
00107   if (btnBack){
00108     btnBack->setFont("Iconified-20");
00109     btnBack->subscribeEvent("Clicked", 
00110       CEGUI::Event::Subscriber(&gsMainMenuTest::onBackToMainClicked,this));
00111 
00112   }
00113   else{
00114     LOGW("Cannot get the 'Back' button");
00115   }
00116 
00117   // Get the Connection window
00118   CEGUI::Window* connectWin=root->getChild("RainbruRPG/Connection");
00119 
00120  // Connect button
00121   CEGUI::Window* btnConnect=connectWin->getChild("Connect");
00122   if (btnConnect){
00123     btnConnect->subscribeEvent("Clicked", 
00124       CEGUI::Event::Subscriber(&gsMainMenuTest::onConnectClicked,this));
00125 
00126   }
00127   else{
00128     LOGW("Cannot get the 'Back' button");
00129   }
00130 
00131 
00132   return true;
00133 }

00152 
00153   GuiManager::getSingleton().removeCurrentCEGUILayout();
00154 
00155   GuiManager::getSingleton().loadCEGUILayout("mainmenu.layout");
00156   GuiManager::getSingleton().beginGuiFadeIn();
00157 
00158   setupMainMenu();
00159 
00160   return true;

00172 void RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuTest::setupMainMenu(){
00173   LOGI("setupMainMenu called");
00174   // Subscribe event
00175   CEGUI::Window* root=CEGUI::System::getSingleton().getGUISheet();
00176 
00177   // Quit button
00178   CEGUI::Window* btnQuit=root->getChild("Quit");
00179   if (btnQuit){
00180     btnQuit->setFont("Iconified-20");
00181     btnQuit->subscribeEvent("Clicked", 
00182              CEGUI::Event::Subscriber(&gsMainMenuTest::onQuitClicked,this));
00183 
00184   }
00185   else{
00186     LOGW("Cannot get the 'Quit' button");
00187   }
00188 
00189 
00190   // Local test
00191   CEGUI::Window* btnLocalTest=root->getChild("LocalTest");
00192   if (btnLocalTest){
00193     btnLocalTest->setFont("Iconified-20");
00194     btnLocalTest->subscribeEvent("Clicked", 
00195              CEGUI::Event::Subscriber(&gsMainMenuTest::onLocalTestClicked,
00196                                       this));
00197   }
00198   else{
00199     LOGW("Cannot get the 'Quit' button");
00200   }
00201 
00202   // Network game
00203   CEGUI::Window* btnNetGame=root->getChild("NetGame");
00204   if (btnNetGame){
00205     btnNetGame->setFont("Iconified-20");
00206     btnNetGame->subscribeEvent("Clicked", 
00207              CEGUI::Event::Subscriber(&gsMainMenuTest::onNetworkGameClicked,
00208                                       this));
00209   }
00210   else{
00211     LOGW("Cannot get the 'Network game' button");
00212   }

00214 }

00223 bool RainbruRPG::Core::gsMainMenuTest::
00224 onConnectClicked(const CEGUI::EventArgs& evt){
00225   LOGI("Connect button clicked");
00226 
00227   // Get the strings
00228   CEGUI::Window* root=CEGUI::System::getSingleton().getGUISheet();
00229   CEGUI::Window* connectWin=root->getChild("RainbruRPG/Connection");
00230   CEGUI::Window* name=connectWin->getChild("RainbruRPG/Connection/Name");
00231   CEGUI::Window* pwd=connectWin->getChild("RainbruRPG/Connection/Pwd");
00232   const char* cName=name->getText().c_str();
00233   const char* cPwd=pwd->getText().c_str();
00234   LOGCATS("Name :");
00235   LOGCATS(cName);
00236   LOGCATS("Pwd :");
00237   LOGCATS(cPwd);
00238   LOGCAT();
00239 
00240   HashPassword hp;
00241 
00242   std::string hashPwd=hp.encryptString(cPwd);
00243   GameEngine::getSingleton().connectUser(cName, hashPwd.c_str());
00244 
00245   return true;
00246 }
